Class AccountResourceTest

java.lang.Object
kp.resources.AccountResourceTest
class AccountResourceTest extends Object
The unit tests for the AccountResource.

It uses the mocked services:

  • AccountMongoService
  • AccountPostgresService

  • Field Summary

    The mocked service for the PostgreSQL.

    (package private) void
    shouldDeleteAllAccounts()

    Should not find account in both databases: PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

  • Constructor Details

      AccountResourceTest()

  • Method Details

    • shouldReadAccountFromPostgres

      @Test @DisplayName("read account from postgres") void shouldReadAccountFromPostgres()
      Should read account from PostgreSQL database.

    • shouldCreateAccountInPostgresAndReturnIt

      @Test @DisplayName("create account in postgres and return it") void shouldCreateAccountInPostgresAndReturnIt()
      Should not find account in PostgreSQL database.

      From the account in MongoDB database it should create the new account in PostgreSQL database and put it in response.

    • shouldNotFindAccount

      @Test @DisplayName("do not find account") void shouldNotFindAccount()
      Should not find account in both databases: PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

    • shouldNotReturnAccountWhenNotCreatedInPostgres

      @Test @DisplayName("do not return account when not created in postgres") void shouldNotReturnAccountWhenNotCreatedInPostgres()
      Should not return account when it failed the account creation in PostgreSQL database.

    • shouldDeleteAllAccounts

      @Test @DisplayName("delete all accounts") void shouldDeleteAllAccounts()
      Should delete all accounts in both databases: PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
